biotools.summary: The Bologna ENZyme Web Server (BENZ WS) annotates the Enzyme Commission numbers (EC numbers) of enzymes. BENZ WS is based on HMMs and PFAMs and returns a four-level EC number for a target which is retained by the system.

bioschemas.name: BENZ WS
